column1: #Text=Six dead in campus shooting at Northern Illinois University
#Text=Six people were killed and 16 others injured in a shooting at the Northern Illinois University in DeKalb , Illinois , United States .
#Text=Reports indicate that the shooter emerged from a curtain or a screen at the front of an auditorium in Cole Hall armed with a shotgun and two pistols and began shooting .
#Text=Authorities have tentatively identified the shooter as Stephen Kazmierczak .
#Text=NIU officials said the shooter was enrolled at the university as late as the spring semester of 2007 , and was now a student at the University of Illinois in Urbana-Champaign .
#Text=Many of the victims were taken to local hospitals .
#Text=Kishwaukee Community Hospital reported a total of 18 patients brought to the hospital .
#Text=Eight of the patients were discharged later in the day , while seven were transferred to other regional hospitals for treatment .
#Text=One victim died at Kishwaukee Hospital , another died after being transferred to St. Anthony 's Hospital in Rockford , while the other four fatalities were confirmed at the scene .
#Text=News about the shooting emerged at 3:20 p.m. CST , when a special campus notice was posted on the university 's website , indicating the presence of a gunman on campus .

#Text=Twenty minutes later , NIU announced the cancellation of all classes for the remainder of the evening , and ten minutes after that announcement , NIU officials confirmed there had been a shooting and that emergency personnel were handling the situation .
#Text=" The ambulance took away two students on the ground right outside my dorm , " Dominique Broxton , a student at NIU , told the Chicago Tribune .
